metadata.title: CVE-2015-8980 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The plural form formula in ngettext family of calls in php-gettext before 1.0.12 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code. Danilo Segan discovered that php-gettext mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-8980` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-php-gettext - 1.0.12-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-gettext package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-0.1').
